Load and display a specific Comment's major content in CommentPageActivity (an Activity displays a specific Comment's content).

Add a comment id to the top level IdSet and update the IdSet in the server while publish a new top level comment.

Put a Comment with the specific id into the CommentMap from the web server.
loadSpecificProfileForUpdate(String, Activity, ImageButton, EditText, EditText, EditText, EditText) - Method in class network_io.ProfileIoHandler
Load and display the UserProfile in the UI and allow the user to edit.(if there are no such profile, then the only userNameInput EditText will be filled with the current user name);
loadSpecificProfileForView(String, Activity, ImageView, TextView, TextView, TextView, TextView) - Method in class network_io.ProfileIoHandler
Load and display the UserProfile in the UI and allow the user to view.(if there are no such profile, then the only userName TextView will be filled with the comment author name);
loadTopLevelComments(CommentMap, Activity) - Method in class network_io.IoStreamHandler
Load all of the top level comments in to a CommentMap.

LocationComparator - Class in comparator
A comparator class which compare 2 Comment's location with the given center location and sort them by distance.
